answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hello,
You seem to be looking for ICMA-RC. (ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org, or call 1-800-669-7400.
Pooja Varma
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org
